Articles.Content: Hi there! I've seen videos but haven't played so I figured it was time to join. Although there is one problem. To put it simply, I'm not good with computers. Haven't even been able to figure out how to start the game itself. Also, should this question be in problems? Otherwise, Thanks!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Just unzip the downloaded file in to a folder of your choice and run the KSP program.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
